page.title: 01Hants/Surrey border scene.
page.content: Two villages,{Grayshott}in{ {Hampshire}and{Beacon Hill}in{Surrey}, both about{200 metres}above sea level on the Greensand western rim of the Weald are the main centres of population. Around them are designated areas of woodland and heathland beauty. A stream in a steep sided valley is the border between Surrey and Hampshire, the valley sides are a mixture of conifer plantations and beech and oak woods. To the west is heathland. Population mainly commuters. Many drive to{Haslemere}for trains to{ {London}(about 40 miles) and{Portsmouth (about 30 miles).Many families have more than one car. Bus services go to{ {Haslemere, Guildford, Aldershot}and{ {Petersfield}. There is no large scale industry.
